text.p: The following are the leading stories in the Maltese press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Government publishes white paper on new tax system. The system, consisting mostly of customs and excise duties, will replace Value Added Tax.
- Opposition Nationalist Party says government's proposals for an alternative system to VAT is nothing more than a re-packaging, with the main aspects of VAT being retained.
- Historic Super Constellation aircraft burnt and destroyed. The four-engined Constellation last flew in 1968.
